Class SetsExercisesAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SetsExercisesAdapter.MyViewHolder>
com.example.omrifit.adapters.SetsExercisesAdapter
public class SetsExercisesAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SetsExercisesAdapter.MyViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of exercises with their sets.
